turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. What am I supposed to do here?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want to make an order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I do, I want to order a coffee drink for pickup at a nearby store.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which store did you want me to place the order at?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. and what did you want to order from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like an Espresso, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want milk in that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of milk did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want a venti Espresso with 2% milk from Starbucks in Gainesville in Florida.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've ordered your drink for you at Starbucks and it should be ready for pick up in 9 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.
